<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Countries and Flags</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Länder und Markierungsfahnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pays et indicateurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Países e bandeiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paesi e bandierine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χώρες και σημαίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Países e indicadores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a short exercise to map the flag of a country with the name of the country in English.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">countries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flags</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine kurze Übung, zum der 
Markierungsfahne eines Landes mit dem Namen des Landes auf englisch 
abzubilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un exercice court pour tracer l'indicateur 
d'un pays avec le nom du pays en anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um exercício curto para traçar a 
bandeira de um país com o nome do país em inglês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'esercitazione corta per tracciare la 
bandierina di un paese con il nome del paese in inglese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια σύντομη άσκηση για να χαρτογραφήσει τη
σημαία μιας χώρας με το όνομα της χώρας στα αγγλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un ejercicio corto para asociar el 
indicador de un país con el nombre del país en inglés.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Länder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Markierungsfahnen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indicateurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">países</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bandeiras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paesi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bandierine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χώρες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημαίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">países</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">indicadores</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
